title: NullPointerException at BonsaiWorldStateUpdater.getStorageValueBySlotHash
body:

### Description
log message: `Critical Exception Processing Transaction`
class: `MainnetTransactionProcessor`

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]
Only seen once

### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: 22.1.3-SNAPSHOT
* Java version: Java11
